channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Google Photos users on Android can now edit their photos by talking to or texting the AI
item.description: The feature is designed to make it easier to edit photos without having to understand which editing tools to use or where they can be found in the app...

item.title: Dedicated mobile apps for vibe coding have so far failed to gain traction
item.description: An analysis of mobile apps offering vibe coding tools shows few have found traction.

item.title: Why One VC Thinks Quantum Is a Bigger Unlock Than AGI
item.description: Venture capitalist Alexa von Tobel is ready to bet on quantum computing—starting with hardware.

item.title: Best External Hard Drive (2025): SSD to Store Data, Video & More
item.description: Need an ultrafast drive for video editing or a rugged option to back up your photos in the field? We’ve got a solution for every situation.

item.title: 10 Best MagSafe Wallets (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: These magnetic wallets will keep your cards safe across both MagSafe and Qi2-enabled devices.

item.title: Telo raises $20 million to build tiny electric trucks for cities
item.description: The round was co-led by designer Yves Béhar and Tesla co-founder Marc Tarpenning, who helped get Telo off the ground in 2022.

item.title: NASA’s new astronaut class includes SpaceX veterans Anna Menon and Yuri Kubo
item.description: SpaceX isn't just a private company – it's becoming an astronaut proving ground.

item.title: WhatsApp can now translate messages on iOS and Android
item.description: The company notes that translations occur on the user's device where WhatsApp cannot see them, which means messages remain encrypted.

item.title: 8 Best Vegan Meal Delivery Services and Kits (2025), Tested, Tasted, and Reviewed
item.description: Convenience isn’t just for meat eaters anymore. These vegan meal kits and delivery services bring preprepared meals and meal kits to your door.

item.title: DHS Has Been Collecting US Citizens’ DNA for Years
item.description: Newly released data shows Customs and Border Protection funneled the DNA of nearly 2,000 US citizens—some as young as 14—into an FBI crime database, r...
